title: I wonder how many people will buy headhunter bundle and will be like
body: "O shit headhunter akali isn't in it."

replies.body:
Hey Kawaii Kha! Thanks for pointing this out.  We'll be looking at these bundles in the future.  What we don't want is the "Oh Shit - where is my [enter name of desired skin]?!" to happen.  The idea here is to offer a bundle that allows you to pick up the older content at a discount so you can fill out the skins you're missing for a theme you really like.

But if the sense is that the bundle is misleading, it may make the most sense to put them all in the bundle :)

Thanks for calling this out!
It does seem a little strange that Akali is not included. Odds are if you want the 4 older skins, you're likely to also purchase Akali as well.

Yea i totally bought it thinking it had akali in it :'(

Lol I think the buyers have your answer here, Hoff. I'm not a buyer, but I am a bit confused why it's not included. I think the expectation was that buying the bundle meant getting all of the skins in that vein. 

As far as I know we haven't seen many cases where there was a single new entry into an old series. We usually see two or three new entries into the series (Harrowing, Snowdown, Lunar Revel) and then have a year-by-year bundle rather than an exclusion of newer skins.

I think it's just easier and more accessible as a consumer to be able to see a thematic bundle and assume all of the skins in that vein are included. Don't make me think about the purchase, because if you do there's a chance you'll lose the sale.
Buyer here. I was misled by this bundle as well.
does it have headhunter nid in it?

It is unfortunate but probably a good number.
A troubling amount of people would spend their money, *real money* without taking the five seconds it would take to see what they are even buying.  What's worse is that people the same thing with credit cards, never bothering to even look and find what the terms of payment are.

I too was a buyer confused by the bundle... Although I don't mind having bought the other skins (yi was the only one I had left) I had the impression that Headhunter Akali was included. Sadly I no longer have enough rp to get akali :/ I would much rather have had Akali than the yi, seeing as how I never play him.
Purchased bundle. Saw Headhunter Akali not unlocked. Died inside.
No Headhunter Akali in the bundle? Well... I was going to buy the bundle...
